short_description: This function predicts target values (regression) and class labels (classification) for test data using an SVM model trained by TD_SVM
long_description: This function predicts target values (regression) and class labels (classification) for test data using an SVM model trained by TD_SVM

input_tables.name: inputtable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

input_tables.name: modeltable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the model data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the model data.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the column that uniquely identifies an observation in the test table.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the column that uniquely identifies an observation in the test table.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the names of the input table columns that need to be copied from the input test table to output.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the input table columns that need to be copied from the input test table to output.

argument_clauses.name: OutputProb
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether the function should output the probability for each response. Only applicable if ModelType is CLASSIFICATION.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether the function should output the probability for each response. Only applicable if ModelType is CLASSIFICATION.

argument_clauses.name: Responses
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the class labels to output probabilities. Only applicable if OutputProb is true. A label must be 0 or 1. If not specified, the function outputs the probability of the predicted response.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the class labels to output probabilities. Only applicable if OutputProb is true. A label must be 0 or 1. If not specified, the function outputs the probability of the predicted response.

argument_clauses.name: ModelType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the type of the analysis. Acceptable values are Regression, Classification.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the type of the analysis. Acceptable values are Regression, Classification.
